page.title: 07Leisure Centre:Lancing
page.content: The walls are made from wattle and daub with some brick infill. Such buildings are Grants Manor.The old cottage and friars flats are all built around the time of Henry the Vll. {Leisure Centre:Lancing In 1972 the manor house was taken down to make way for a Leisure Centre. The Manor House had already been there 200 years.Now the leisure centre has been built.New area of the manor are gradually turning in to sports areas. The Leisure centre is surrounded by a bowlihg greens,cricket ground,Allot - ments a playing area and tennis courts. There is a car park for the Leisure centre users and a small rain shelter for cricketers. There is a Adur Leisure mobile that goes round in holidays and supplies us
